name: leagueoveralltopplayers
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool icehockeyapi.
Tool description: IceHockeyApi offers you real time hockey livescore, tables, statistics, fixtures and results for more than 70 ice hockey leagues, cups and tournaments.
For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/allsportsapi2/
API description: Get the top players for a specific Ice Hockey league by providing the tournament ID and season ID.

seasonid.description: The ID of the season for which the top players are to be retrieved.

tournamentid.description: The unique ID of the handball tournament for which the top players are to be retrieved.
